events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The shipping was supposed to be faster, but the package is very late.
The issue reported involves a shipping delay, so the case is assigned to the Delivery Delay category based on the customer's description.
The case has been assigned to the shipping support team to investigate the delayed delivery issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to assist you with the delay on your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can check the status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is XYZ987654321. The tracking info hasn’t updated in days.
I checked the tracking system and it looks like your package is delayed in transit. We will escalate this to our delivery partner and update you within 24 hours.
Thanks for the update. I hope the package arrives soon. Please keep me posted on any progress or changes.
Following up on your case, we have escalated the shipment delay issue to our delivery partner and requested immediate action.
Your order has now been located and is out for delivery. It should arrive by end of day today. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to confirm you received your package. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if further assistance is needed.
Yes, I received the package today and everything looks good. Thank you for your help resolving the delay issue!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing the case now, and thank you for your patience throughout the process.
